subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Bill Haas, Jason Bohn, Tom Gillis and the Champions Tour player Tom Lehman shot fix-under 65s in chilly conditions to share the lead in the suspended first round of the Phoenix Open in Scottsdale.
snippet: Bill Haas, Jason Bohn, Tom Gillis and the Champions Tour player Tom Lehman shot fix-under 65s in chilly conditions to share the lead in the suspended first round of the Phoenix Open in Scottsdale.
